invocations.description: Reconnects you to the game server on the last character played. If usectrlg is true it will connect using Ctrl+G. This is useful when your connection times out and you're not sent back to the login screen.
invocations.ex:
auto(2500)
if not $connected then
	reconnect()
end
invocations.exDescription: Each 2500 milliseconds, it will check if you are connected. If you are not, it will reconnect to the last character you logged in.

invocations.description: Reconnects to the game server on the character charname which is on the same account as the character that was last played.
